datasource: Brandeis Now Brandeis Now 2010-12-03 14:21:00 Students offer 'a positive' in response to extremists Hundreds of students, faculty and staff braved biting cold on the Great Lawn Friday morning, Dec. 3, to celebrate Brandeis' history of fully embracing diversity. Speakers at the kickoff rally noted that the celebration was a response ? but not a reaction ? to the presence at the university?s entrance of demonstrators from a small, anti-Semitic, homophobic church. http://www.brandeis.edu/now/2010/december/celebratebrandeis.html
